pros: Super stable; Top-notch build quality; Versatile as a walking or gym shoe; Bouncy midsole; Excellent for winter conditions; Plush upper and heel for comfort; Unique ride
cons: High price point at $170; Questionable outsole durability; Could have better breathability
RR_verdict: On Cloudstratus nails the role of a firm-yet-comfy road running shoe, perfect for casual runners who enjoy moderate paces. In our tests, we found it's even versatile enough to double for cross-training or walking. While it leans a bit towards the expensive side at $170 and durability might raise an eyebrow, we consider its well-rounded features and amazing build quality make it a popular choice for those seeking an all-purpose running shoe.
awards: Top 13% in road running shoes, Top 12% in On running shoes
